items.name: Administrative Service
items.description: Administrative endpoints with system command execution capabilities

items.name: Application Storage Bucket
items.description: S3 bucket for file storage, logs, and delivery tracking data

items.name: Authentication Service
items.description: API key-based authentication service with hardcoded credentials

items.name: Badger Database
items.description: PostgreSQL database storing badger location and status data

items.name: Badger Delivery ALB
items.description: Application Load Balancer distributing traffic to ECS containers

items.name: Badger Delivery Web Application
items.description: Flask-based web application providing badger delivery services

items.name: Badger ECS Cluster
items.description: ECS Fargate cluster hosting the Flask application containers

items.name: Badger PostgreSQL Database
items.description: AWS RDS PostgreSQL instance storing badger and user data

items.name: Badger Redis Cache
items.description: ElastiCache Redis cluster for caching badger search results and session data

items.name: Badger Search Service
items.description: Service for searching and locating available badgers

items.name: Delivery Database
items.description: PostgreSQL database storing delivery tracking information

items.name: Partner Webhook Services
items.description: External partner services sending webhook notifications

items.name: Redis Cache Store
items.description: Redis cache storing serialized badger search results and session data

items.name: User Database
items.description: PostgreSQL database storing user accounts and API keys

items.name: Web Browser Client
items.description: Web browser clients accessing the badger delivery service

items.name: Webhook Handler Service
items.description: Service handling incoming webhooks from partner services

items.name: Wildlife Trackers API
items.description: External API service providing additional badger tracking data

items.name: Project Threats
items.description: The 'Project Threats' group is used to address threats, weaknesses, and countermeasures at the global scope of the project, rather than being tied to any specific component.
